# CPNavigationAlertMinimumDuration

**Global Variable**

A constant that defines the minimum amount of time that an alert is visible.

## Declaration

```swift
let CPNavigationAlertMinimumDuration: TimeInterval
```

## Discussion

The minimum duration is in effect when [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPNavigationAlert/duration] is not zero.

## Getting the Alert Duration

- **duration**: The amount of time, in seconds, that the alert is visible.
